bibl.title: Kosmas and Damianus in Egyptian Onomastics.
Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P.Gascou)

bibl.note: The personal names Kosmas and Damianus are one aspect of the cult of the two saintly doctors. They are hardly ever found before the 6th century AD and may therefore be a helpful criterion to date Byzantine papyri. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Willy Clarysse, Kosmas and Damianus in Egyptian Onomastics.
Jean-Luc Fournet & Arietta Papaconstantinou (edd.), Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P. Gascou) = TravMém 20 (2016) 1, pp. 559-564, 6 tabl., 1 graphique, 1 fig.; - 657.

The personal names Kosmas and Damianus are one aspect of the cult of the two saintly doctors. They are hardly ever found before the 6th century AD and may therefore be a helpful criterion to date Byzantine papyri. - Avec résumé en anglais.
